mapper.select: select A.zid zid, A.zname zname,B.zidentity zidentity from zstudent A,ztraining_facility B,zstudent_login C,zstudent_schedule D ,zschedule E where A.zid=C.zstudentID and C.zrecognizeIP=B.zstudentPCIP and D.zstudentID=A.Zid and D.zstate="在上课" and D.zscheduleID=E.zid and E.ztrainingroomID =#{ztrainingroomID} and E.zid=#{zscheduleid} group by A.zname
